Articles.Content: Hi everyone! I've been a KSP fan for a few days now, and this forum looks really awesome. I look forward to discussing KSP and sharing rockets and stuff! ;D

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

Greeting Kearthlings. I've had the program a few days now, and have finally achieved orbit. Ran out of fuel, so it's permanent, I believe. I made one 'lap' and was dropping elevation fast, but just as i passed over the KSC, I bottomed out at 268 km and started climbing again. I must say this game is awesome.

@BuzzAldrin

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.
